A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Where to begin.  Is it any good? Yes it is good. Is it empire strikes  back? No it it not as good as any of the origonal trilogy.  Is it better than the force awakens? Yes and no. Is it better than rogue one? No it is not. Is it a mature film or a kiddy fest ? Both sadly.

The film is a gloriously dumb mess with poor writing and direction and a lack of much needed editing.  The acting can be poor and the characters under developed as much as their bizarre motivations.  The cgi is terrible as much as it is  beautiful and for every awful cgi creature there seems to be an excellent puppet.

There are some genuinely funny moments as much as some cringe worthy out of place slapstick and many of the best actors and loved characters feature far too little ...and cp30 is told to shut up in the most disrespectful way.

I'd say it lacked wonder and magic and so maybe miss the big screen and watch on the smaller screen where maybe a fan edit has removed the bloated fluff.

Big shout out to the excellent Carrie F. And almost as good Mark H. Who reallybsre the much needed likable adults in the films. Leia positively shines and so good to see them back again.  Such a loss for the franchise as she was far from gone and unlike Ford (in TFA) she like Hammil seemed to actually want to be there.

Also what's up with the AtAT..they look like gorillas!  
Lastly I'm sick of every professional review claiming that the RT score is rigged and just 4chan fanboys.  I'm a huge fan and I've paid my money and I'm saying clearly that for the cost of the film\, the legacy\, pedigree and cast and crew we should of had a much better more coherent film.
